Plot: The story of singer Tina Turner's rise to stardom and how she gained the courage to break free from abusive husband, Ike Turner.
Title: What's Love Got to Do with It
Writer: Tina Turner (book), Kurt Loder (book), Kate Lanier (screenplay)
Actors: Rae'Ven Larrymore Kelly, Virginia Capers, Dororthy Thorton, Demetrice Cheathon
Awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 3 wins & 11 nominations.
